content: chain 3 2 double_crochet cluster in 3rd chain from hook repeat from * around end with a chain 2 double_crochet cluster in same space 3 double_crochet cluster in top of previous row s 3 double_crochet cluster row 4 repeat row 3 until length from row 1 to a completed current row equals your #2 measurement tie off weave in ends finishing weave the cord or ribbon under every other cluster across row 2 until the ends meet then knot each end designed by flexiblefashions net copyright © 2003 all rights reserved
